description: n^[number of distinct prime factors of n] (A001221).
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=1,...,1000
example: n=30, a(30)=30^3=27000 n=72, a(72)=72^2=5184. Not always equal to product of unitary divisors of n [compare with A061537]. This deviates from A061537 at 30,42,60,66, etc.
prog: (PARI) { for (n=1, 1000, write("b062509.txt", n, " ", n^omega(n)) ) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Aug 08 2009](Haskell)a062509 n = n ^ a001221 n  -- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Sep 13 2013
author: _Labos Elemer_, Jul 13 2001
